title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: CLI and Go library to pull, create, and run GGUF models locally with an OpenAI-compatible HTTP API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for the Ollama HTTP API, installable via npm.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the local API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with fuzzy-find model picker and chat REPL.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python repo showing Retrieval-Augmented Generation with Ollama embeddings and Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducibly installing Ollama and pre-built model bundles.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama in Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-express
summary: Lightweight Express.js proxy that adds JWT auth and rate-limiting to Ollama’s API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed request/response models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Bolt-based Slack bot that threads answers from local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm, and Q&A using an Ollama backend.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container for CI-based LLM testing.

title: ollama-macos-swiftui
summary: Native SwiftUI menu-bar app for macOS that controls Ollama and shows model stats.
